channel.title: How do i make the max stat 99
channel.description:
Hey, How do i change the max level of a stat to 99? Please help.
Thank you; Intrin.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 03, 2007, 08:18:31 PM[/size][hr]Can some one please help?

item.title: How do i make the max stat 99
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Find this:

public int getXPForLevel(int level) {

and replace both things there with this:

[code] public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		if (lvl >= level) {
			return output;
		}
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
	}
	return 0;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 99;
}[/code]

Good luck.
